alert.note: Alert for Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 5:35AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST/11 AM MST/ TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST/11 AM MST/ TODAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, light snow. Additional snow accumulations up to half of an inch. * WHERE...Sioux County. * WHEN...Until Noon CST/11 AM MST/ today. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel due to snow and blowing snow reducing visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Limit outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate winter clothing.
